com.risk.team.model

Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.team.model.Dice

  • public class Dice
extends java.util.Observable
    Class for the dice. Attacking player can have a maximum of 3 dices and the defender can have a maximum of 2 dices. It has methods for simulating the dice rolls for the attack phase
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Kartika Patil

            Country defendingCountry)

        Parameters:
        attackingCountry - Country which is attacking currently
        defendingCountry - Country under attack

      • getDicePlayResult

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDicePlayResult()
        Method for comparing the dice values of attacker and defender. It compares the value in descending order.
        Returns:
        List of the results of the dice throw

      • updateArmiesAfterAttack

        public void updateArmiesAfterAttack(java.lang.Integer defenderValue,
                                    java.lang.Integer attackerValue,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> playResult)
        Method is used to update the armies of the players, after the attack has been completed.
        Parameters:
        defenderValue - Values of defender dice
        attackerValue - Values of attacker dice
        playResult - List of attack results

      • cancelDiceThrow

        public void cancelDiceThrow()
        Method of indicate that the dice roll is complete or cancelled

      • skipMoveArmy

        public void skipMoveArmy()
        Method for skipping the army move after attacker has won the attack. But at least one army will move from attacking to defending country.

      • moveAllArmies

        public void moveAllArmies()
        Move All Armies

      • updateCountryList

      • moveArmies

        public void moveArmies(int armiesToMove,
                       javafx.scene.control.Label message,
                       javafx.scene.control.Button moveArmies)
        Method for moving armies from attacker's country to the defending country, if attacks won the country.
        Parameters:
        armiesToMove - Number aries to move
        message - text fir the label which displays how many armies were moved
        moveArmies - Button to execute the method.

      • generateRandomNumber

        public int generateRandomNumber()
        Method for generating the dice value between 1 to 6.
        Returns:
        A random integer between 1 to 6.

      • checkDiceThrowPossible

        public boolean checkDiceThrowPossible()
        Check if attacker has sufficient number of armies
        Returns:
        true if attacker can execute the attack; else false.
